name: VIP Suites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Honestly I am very surprised by the reviews here. The VIP suites is a small set of "traditional" houses that are managed out of an office near the main bus station in OIA. We booked a stay here for the week of September 18th, 2006, on the glowing reviews seen on trip advisor and other sites. We were escorted to the house and noted that the property was a set of maybe six to eight houses nestled together on on lower part of the mountain. We were the only people staying in one of the houses and had no neighbors. We should of realized this was a sign of what was ahead.
reviews.title: Make sure this is what you want...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Traditional Greek acommodations - cottage like atmosphere. We loved our stay here. Very friendly staff and very relaxing stay. The views from the hotel is absolutely unbelievable - the quintessential Greece seen in postcards with the white builidings and cross topped blue domes overlooking the sea is right out the front door! This was a picture perfect stay for us in Oia and a great change of pace from the hustle and bustle of Athens.
reviews.title: Loved Our Stay

likes.liked: — Great traditional Greek accommodations and Fantastic Views

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here during the off season in late Nov and we loved it here. Tip: rent a car and explore the rest of the island and beaches.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay - Very spacious and beautiful

likes.liked: — It was different from anything you find in the US. Yet still spacious and Gorgous view, nothing better
likes.disliked: — No service - coudln't get toilet paper or towels when needed - only cleaned room once in 5 days

reviews.title: central chic and fabilous
reviews.text: We left Crete a day early and headed to Santotini - We booked through
Dilos so they reserved an extra hotel day for us. I guess same hotel chain - different area. It was Residence Inn. However I see the picture of the room here.
reviews.title: Great holiday

reviews.text: It was a teeny little cottage. Everything was miniature. Not comfortable at all, but in a really nice central area of town. After the first 2 days, they then moved us to the original VIP Suites booking.
reviews.title: VIP only for the view...

description: The newly renovated traditional suites are tastefully furnished with traditional and modern overtones, awash with light and host 2-6 persons in comfort and privacy. Make your stay a memory to cherish.
